entities.name: the dark mark
entities.description: The Dark Mark is mentioned as something that has appeared in the scene, and it's described as being over there.

entities.name: mr. crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is a Ministry wizard who seems to be in charge of the situation.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the students who are being questioned by Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is another student who is being questioned by Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the third student who is being questioned by Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: cedric's father
entities.description: Amos Diggory is Cedric's father and a wizard who seems to be confident that they can catch the students.

entities.name: the ministry wizards
entities.description: The Ministry wizards are a group of people who seem to be working together to deal with the situation.

relationships.description: Mr. Crouch is questioning Hermione about the Dark Mark.
Amos Diggory seems to be confident that they can catch Harry, Ron, and Hermione with the help of the Ministry wizards.
Hermione seems to have some knowledge about how the Dark Mark is summoned.
